body:
Thanks for the issue, 

This is an interesting suggestion and definitely a helpful one. 
My only concern is that it might take some more time to look up and search all plugins when there are too many plugins. 
Though this will not be a big concern still it would be good to handle if possible.

+1 for this

At the moment, we aren't making any further changes to how config works or is used while we are building out the [new config system](https://github.com/eslint/eslint/issues/13481).

I wouldn't mind looking at this again once the new config system is up and running, as I think this is a nice addition to help users out.
Created a PR for this in flat config :)

issue.title: build(deps-dev): bump eslint from 7.32.0 to 8.1.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

repository.name: capture-cam
repository.description: A photo-sharing app with only verifiable photos and videos.

issue.body:
Bumps [eslint](https://github.com/eslint/eslint) from 7.32.0 to 8.1.0.
Release notes

Sourced from [eslint's releases](https://github.com/eslint/eslint/releases).

v8.1.0

  • 446b4b3 Docs: Update commit message format docs ([#15200](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15200)) (Nicholas C. Zakas)
  • d9d84a0 Fix: keyword-spacing conflict with space-infix-ops on > (fixes [#14712](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/14712)) ([#15172](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15172)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • a1f7ad7 Fix: allow baseConfig to extend preloaded plugin config (fixes [#15079](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15079)) ([#15187](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15187)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 3d370fb New: Add no-unused-private-class-members rule (fixes [#14859](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/14859)) ([#14895](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/14895)) (Tim van der Lippe)
  • e926b17 New: Add name to RuleTester ([#15179](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15179)) (Gareth Jones)
  • 90a5b6b Chore: improve performance of :function selector ([#15181](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15181)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 31af1c8 Chore: fix counting of files in performance test ([#15190](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15190)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 1b87fa8 Build: add node v17 ([#15193](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15193)) (唯然)
  • 0fb3bb2 Docs: remove instanceof from keyword-spacing docs ([#15180](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15180)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 249a040 Upgrade: eslint-plugin-eslint-plugin to v4 ([#15169](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15169)) (Bryan Mishkin)
  • 35f3254 Docs: Describe range in rule docs (fixes [#14162](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/14162)) ([#15174](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15174)) (Nicholas C. Zakas)
  • b5049c8 Chore: Update stale bot settings ([#15173](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15173)) (Nicholas C. Zakas)
  • 2b32f50 Docs: Fix typo in README.md ([#15168](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15168)) (Dmitriy Fishman)
  • dd58cd4 Chore: migrate master to main ([#15062](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15062)) (Nitesh Seram)
  • ec0f8e0 Chore: Add stale issue/PR checker ([#15151](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15151)) (Nicholas C. Zakas)
  • 2cfbd4b Docs: Update README team and sponsors (ESLint Jenkins)

v8.0.1

  • f9217e5 Upgrade: @​eslint/eslintrc@​1.0.3 for Jest workaround ([#15164](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15164)) (Brandon Mills)
  • c584a63 Chore: add ecmaVersion 13 to types.js ([#15163](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15163)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • ff5fcd4 Docs: add 13 as allowed ecma version (fixes [#15159](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15159)) ([#15162](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15162)) (唯然)

v8.0.0

  • 7d3f7f0 Upgrade: unfrozen @​eslint/eslintrc (fixes [#15036](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15036)) ([#15146](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15146)) (Brandon Mills)
  • 2174a6f Fix: require-atomic-updates property assignment message (fixes [#15076](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15076)) ([#15109](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15109)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • f885fe0 Docs: add note and example for extending the range of fix (refs [#13706](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/13706)) ([#13748](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/13748)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • 3da1509 Docs: Add jsdoc type annotation to sample rule ([#15085](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15085)) (Bryan Mishkin)
  • 68a49a9 Docs: Update Rollup Integrations ([#15142](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15142)) (xiaohai)
  • d867f81 Docs: Remove a dot from curly link ([#15128](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15128)) (Mauro Murru)
  • 9f8b919 Sponsors: Sync README with website (ESLint Jenkins)
  • 4b08f29 Sponsors: Sync README with website (ESLint Jenkins)
  • ebc1ba1 Sponsors: Sync README with website (ESLint Jenkins)
  • 2d654f1 Docs: add example .eslintrc.json ([#15087](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15087)) (Nicolas Mattia)
  • 16034f0 Docs: fix fixable example ([#15107](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15107)) (QiChang Li)
  • 07175b8 8.0.0-rc.0 (ESLint Jenkins)
  • 71faa38 Build: changelog update for 8.0.0-rc.0 (ESLint Jenkins)
  • 67c0074 Update: Suggest missing rule in flat config (fixes [#14027](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/14027)) ([#15074](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15074)) (Nicholas C. Zakas)
  • cf34e5c Update: space-before-blocks ignore after switch colons (fixes [#15082](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15082)) ([#15093](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15093)) (Milos Djermanovic)

  • 14a4739 Update: no-new-func rule catching eval case of MemberExpression ([#14860](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/14860)) (Mojtaba Samimi)
  • 7f2346b Docs: Update release blog post template ([#15094](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15094)) (Nicholas C. Zakas)
  • fabdf8a Chore: Remove target.all from Makefile.js ([#15088](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15088)) (Hirotaka Tagawa / wafuwafu13)
  • e3cd141 Sponsors: Sync README with website (ESLint Jenkins)
  • 05d7140 Chore: document target global in Makefile.js ([#15084](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15084)) (Hirotaka Tagawa / wafuwafu13)
  • 0a1a850 Update: include ruleId in error logs (fixes [#15037](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15037)) ([#15053](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15053)) (Ari Perkkiö)
  • 47be800 Chore: test Property > .key with { a = 1 } pattern (fixes [#14799](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/14799)) ([#15072](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15072)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • a744dfa Docs: Update CLA info ([#15058](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15058)) (Brian Warner)
  • 9fb0f70 Chore: fix bug report template ([#15061](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15061)) (Milos Djermanovic)
  • f87e199 Chore: Cleanup issue templates ([#15039](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/eslint/eslint/issues/15039)) (Nicholas C. Zakas)

... (truncated)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=eslint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=7.32.0&new-version=8.1.0)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) - - -
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: * `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR * `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it * `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it * `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it * `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging * `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed * `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually * `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) * `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) * `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)
